siteTitle: Damian Cyntler - Software Developer, programming enthusiast, aspiring minimalist.
myHistoryContent: I am a thinker. I have been interested in programming since the age of 12. It has become my passion and work. However, life is not only a profession and work. In life, spheres such as music, sport and psychology are also important to me. I have struggled with anxiety disorders for years.
whatDoContent: Currently, I work as a Software Developer creating very interesting solutions that are used by hundreds of people. Additionally, in my free time I contribute to the open source projects.
